query.value:
SELECT "RETAIL_TRANSACTION_ID", "RETAIL_SITE_ID", "EVENT_START_DATE", 
SUM("SALES_QUANTITY_SUM") AS "SALES_QUANTITY", SUM("SALES_AMOUNT_SUM") AS "SALES_AMOUNT", "LOYALTY_IND", "SALE_OR_RETURN_INDICATOR" , 
"SYSTEM_ID", "SALES_TRANSACTION_NUMBER", "CALENDAR_YEAR_C", "COUNTRY_CODE", "START_DATE"
FROM "SHELL_POC"."CT_EDAM_RETAIL_TRANSACTION_LINE_FACT_FF"
WHERE "LOYALTY_IND" = 'Y'
AND "SALE_OR_RETURN_INDICATOR" = 'S'
AND "START_DATE" < '2019-08-31'
GROUP BY 
"RETAIL_TRANSACTION_ID", "RETAIL_SITE_ID", "EVENT_START_DATE",  "LOYALTY_IND", "SALE_OR_RETURN_INDICATOR" , 
"SYSTEM_ID", "SALES_TRANSACTION_NUMBER", "CALENDAR_YEAR_C", "COUNTRY_CODE", "START_DATE"
